sentences.english: He expelled the male shrine prostitutes from the land and got rid of all the idols his fathers had made.
sentences.chinese: 從國中除去孌童，又除掉他列祖所造的一切偶像。

sentences.english: The causes of pedophilia are unknown.
sentences.chinese: 尚不清楚孌童癖的形成原因。

sentences.english: The child molestation case was settled out of court with Jackson reportedly paying the boy millions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 孌童案達成庭外和解與傑克遜據說男孩百萬美元支付。

sentences.english: Only the desire for sexual contact with them should be called " pedophilia ".
sentences.chinese: 唯一與兒童的性接觸的慾望應該被稱爲“孌童癖”。

sentences.english: ALLEN I'm wanted for pederasty in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 我因孌童而在蒙古國遭到通緝。

definition: to have a fist fight/fist fight/brawl
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
man behind the mirror/puppet master/string puller
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
